alert.note: Alert for Coastal Sarasota; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 5:41PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Charlotte and Sarasota Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 540 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Myakka River State Park to 9 miles south of North Port. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... North Port, Sarasota, Punta Gorda, Port Charlotte, Sarasota Springs, South Gate Ridge, Lake Sarasota, Saint Armands Key, Southgate, Gulf Gate Estates, Myakka River State Park, Ridge Wood Heights, South Sarasota, Kensington Park, The Meadows, Murdock, Vamo, El Jobean, Oscar Scherer State Park and Grove City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
